trans-unit.source: Prompts the user to select a location for saving a file.
This class can either open and overwrite an existing file or create a new file.
Most of the functionality for this class is found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog> class.
Initializes a new instance of this class.
This class is safe to instantiate in any security zone; appropriate permission demands are placed on the individual properties and methods.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box prompts the user for permission to create a file if the user specifies a file that does not exist.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dialog box prompts the user before creating a file if the user specifies a file name that does not exist; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the dialog box automatically creates the new file without prompting the user for permission.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Opens the file with read/write permission selected by the user.
The read/write file selected by the user.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Save As" name="Save As" href=""></xref> dialog box displays a warning if the user specifies a file name that already exists.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dialog box prompts the user before overwriting an existing file if the user specifies a file name that already exists; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the dialog box automatically overwrites the existing file without prompting the user for permission.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Resets all dialog box options to their default values.
